title: Junk Bonds Eye 20-Month Breakout
text:
SPDR® Bloomberg Barclays High Yield Bond ETF

Are junk bonds about to send stocks a bullish message? A breakout test is in play that will go a long way to answering that question.

Junk Bond ETF is currently testing the January 2018 highs and the March 2017 lows at (1).

While testing these key levels, it is also testing two falling resistance lines.

If JNK succeeds in breaking above this key resistance zone, Junk bonds will send stocks a short-term bullish message.

Keep a close eye on JNK here, as this is not your typical short-term resistance/breakout test.
description: Bonds Analysis by Chris Kimble covering: SPDR® Bloomberg Barclays High Yield Bond ETF. Read Chris Kimble's latest article on Investing.com
